this spray is so nice! it smells great and definitely helps tame my frizz. i have a mix of loose wavy/curly hair and i struggle a lot with frizz. using this spray in combination with the BB Curl shampoo and conditioner has worked wonders for my frizz! this product works great alone too. the spray makes my hair super soft and a little goes a long ways! i spray it into my hands and then rub it onto my hair. i love that it heat protects too. definitely recommend! my hair feels and looks so healthy. I received this complimentary from Bumble and Bumble

I liked these products because my curls look more hydrated and with less frizz, which is one of my problems. I love the scent of the products. I can't wait to see long-term results. Gifted by Bumble and bumble Thank you! Me encantaron estos productos por que mis rizos se ven mas hidratados y con menos frizz. También me encanta su fragancia. No puedo esperar para ver los resultados a largo tiempo. La compañía bumble and bumble me envio estos magníficos productos. Gracias!

I use the Curl Reactivator on my wavy/curly hair and it does a really awesome job at refreshing my second day hair and enhancing my curls. I spray on to dry hair, then scrunch. I love that it adds moisture, some volume, and helps reduce my frizz. I noticed that after day 3 this starts to make my hair feel a little heavy, however, I do have fine hair so I'm not too surprised. But my curls still look amazing! I'm really loving this! ( Gifted by Bumble and Bumble but opinions are all my own. )

This smells AMAZING! I'm a huge scent person, so for me that is a big win. (It is strong though so if you are not a fan or sensitive for this, definitely consider that) I have dark brown hair (level 2/3) highlighted to a very light blonde (level 8/9). So that on top of being naturally curly (3a/2c) my hair is always super dry. Because of this I try to not wash it more than 1-2 times per week. When I leave it curly this helps to freshen up my curls and add a bit more moisture. Complimentary from Bumble & Bumble!

I must say my hair is loving this! My hair is naturally curly but after bleaching/dying and daily use of hot tools it lost it's natural curls. This leave-in seems to be giving me back some waves without the crunchy effect, it even helped curl my ends some which I haven't been able to get my hair to do naturally in a while. Love the ingredients and the smell is incredible! I received this product complimentary from Bumble and Bumble and I definitely would recommend it !!

@bumbleandbumble gifted me. I was getting the reactivator and to my surprise I got the whole collection thank you so much @bumbleandbumble this was a amazing surprise. . . . Shampoo: It has a rich consistency, with a milky color. The shampoo lathers quite well, love the soft flowery scent to it. . . . 3-in-1 conditioner: I used this to detangle in shower. It has a soft flowery scent to it. And it indeed detangled my hair rather fast. My curls looked defined even when they were wet. I used little bit of conditioner to style my hair as well after for leave in. . . . Reactivator: The reactivator has a spray nozzle, and sprays a generous amount of product. I used it the second and the third curl hair day. And it totally refreshed my curls, Also my frizz was visibly less. It was extremely easy to use and fast. The nozzle sprays out a generous amount of product, so it's easier to fix your curls, leaving your curls looking healthy and soft without it being crunchy. I have never been so satisfied with a product up until now. I genuinely loved using all the products.my curls have never felt this soft, bouncy and hydrated. They are amazing and I just loved them all. The best part is All the products are free from parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, sulfate cleansers, which is so amazing.

This product was gifted by Bumble and Bumble for testing purposes, and unfortunately it doesn't work for me. It made my second day 2B/2C waves stringy and frizzy. My hair is very high porosity, so I wonder if that was a factor in how my 'do responded to this spray. On the positive side, it didn't leave my hair feeling sticky or coated and it smells fantastic! This does contain silicones towards the bottom of the ingredient list, so if you follow the curly girl method know that this isn't technically approved, but I would be comfortable using this if I was going to clarify soon.

This curl activator smells delicious! Bumble and bumble gifted me their curl line and this product is already reviving my curls. My hair is so moisturized and SILKY, it's actually making it effortless for me to wear my hair curly. No frizz and lots of volume! I'm a fan!!

I have very fine curly hair and I was worried this would be too heavy for my hair but it's worked wonderfully! I know its meant for 2nd and 3rd day curls but it has worked well even for right after shower hair. Also I like the stray bottle style, easy to spray through and spread easily. Only needed a few sprays to work and fix my curls! So helpful for frizz and control! This product was gifted by bumble and bumble but opinions are my own.

My new go-to product for my curls! Bumble and bumble gifted me this Reactivator spray which is slowly but surely bringing my curls back to life. If I feel they are losing their definition and shine, I just spritz this in, scrunch my curls and voila! I use this together with the Bumble and bumble Curl Shampoo and 3-In-1 Conditioner, which they have kindly gifted me as well, and together, this is an amazing combo ♥️ thank you!

bumble and bumble gifted me their curl deactivated, moisturizing shampoo, and 3-in-1 conditioner! all three of these products are nutrient rich and immediately hydrate your hair as well and reduce frizz and provide an instant shine! my curls have never been so rejuvenated and luscious. immediately after trying this, I knew I could never go back! my curls absolutely love these products and I am so grateful that I was able to try them! thank you so much, bumble and bumble!

I received the The Bb. Curl Reactivator complimentary from Bumble and Bumble along with the shampoo and conditioner. This is my first time using products from Bumble and Bumble and I am loving it. Firstly, the fragrance of all these products are amazing. I love it when my hair smells good throughout the day. It makes me feel fresh too. I have wavy/lightly curly, dry hair and this set provides good amount of hydration. Also, my hair looks healthy after using it. All this with only one wash!! I will continue using these for sure!

I used this product in combination with the whole Bumble & Bumble line including the shampoo and the conditioner. I have naturally wavy hair with tighter curls at the bottom that had lost their definition due to dryness and frizz. This curl reactivator system was able to hydrate and bring my curls back to life. It's not complete magic so I still clearly need a haircut to cut off frizzy split ends but it worked on the rest of my hair to add shine and definition without weighing it down. My hair wasn't left oily or sticky and smelled amazing! Disclaimer: I received these products gifted by Bumble and Bumble for testing and honest feedback.

This product was gifted by bumble and bumble. I love this product! It made my hair so smooth, and defined! It hydrated my hair a ton, which is great since I have dry hair! Overall, I really recommend this product!

The Bb curl reactivator was gifted to me from bumble and bumble. I love how my curls turned out after using this as a leave in conditioner. I also used it on my third day curls to reactivate them and they looked just as good as the first day. I love how lightweight it feels on my hair and the beautiful frizz free curls.

I have never tried any of bumble and bumbles hair products before so I wasn't sure what to expect! The shampoo washed my oily and dandruff scalp really well, and the conditioner left my hair super soft! I have frizzy wavy hair so the curl reactivator worked well enough! I received these products gifted by bumble and bumble but review is my all my own!

Bumble and Bumble gifted me their Bb. Curl Reactivator in exchange for an honest review. My hair is wavy (2B) on the top half and curlier (3A) underneath on the bottom half. It's also fine so it's weighed down very easily and my curls tend to become a wilted mess overnight. This definitely does the job of re-activating them the next morning so that I only need a few strategic curling iron waves added to revive the style. It's super hydrating which leaves my hair feeling incredibly soft but also weighs it down easily so I'm really only able to get 1 extra day out of it. I also like to use it on clean hair as a moisturizing detangled to define curls and act as a UV Protective leave-in treatment prior to styling. This would be the perfect product for anyone with 3B or tighter curls without a doubt!

This product was far more than I ever thought it would be! It worked great on both wet and dry hair! My hair is super thick and it kept my curls looking beautiful and soft! It smells amazing and gave me hope in beautiful curly hair! Thank you to bumble and bumble for giving me this opportunity to try this product and send it to me as a gift to try Definitely will buy this from now on!

I received this curl reactivator complimentary from Bumble and Bumble for my honest review. I love using this as a detangler. I use the shampoo and conditioner from this curl line and after I towel dry my hair I mist this generously from the middle and ends of my hair. It smells amazing and detangles so well! My hair feels silky soft once it's dried and my curls are better than ever! They aren't crunchy at all but more springy if that makes sense. It also keeps the frizz away! I love this line so much! Highly recommend!

I have thick naturally curly hair with a medium curl. Something was missing from my curl maintenance products. I always use Moroccanoil Curl Defining Cream on my wet hair after washing and Davines Sea Salt Spray on my dry hair for a textured hold. To revive my curls on Day 2 and beyond I would rewet my hair and scrunch the curls. I needed a moisturizing styling mist to better reactivate my curls of Day 2 and beyond. The Bb Curl Reactivator gives my curls the boost I was missing. It could be love.

my curls have never looked so beautiful! i have tried all kinds of products and i have always been disappointed with other products, whether they dried my hair out, didn't hold my curl , smelled too perfumey or weighed my hair down. This product is light but has a great hold and doesnt leave your hair crunchy! finally, ive found a product that works and keeps the compliments coming!
I have 4 different curl types in my hair and this reactivates them nicely on day 2 and beyond. I don't like the smell of this one though.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I would have to say the Diptyque Baies Mini Candle is only OK.  This was a blind purchase. I wasn't sure what I would receive but had I smelled this prior to purchasing, I don't think I would have settled on this scent.  I was hoping for more of a berry smell, but to me this smells more like my Grandmothers house in the sense that it smells like dusty roses.  Perhaps I've purchased this candle in the wrong season; spring may be a better time to light this. 

However, with all that being said, as a candle I have to say it is spectacular.  I live in a studio type apartment and this mini candle certainly gets around the place.  The scent is soft and not overwhelming so I don't mind that my home smells faintly of roses. Also, when I put the flame out; the scent doesn't transform into some gruesome odor as many other popular brands do, which is a huge plus for me and future Diptyque purchases.  

I do recommend smelling before buying but if you're like me and make blind purchases then honestly this isn't a bad one to make.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Best candle and best place to buy it. The sales associates are the friendliest and most knowledgeable around. Thanks, Bloomingdales, for the best shopping experience ever.

Reminiscent of a bouquet of roses, currant leaves and berries, there's a reason why Baies reigns as the brand's most popular scent. The scent of this candle is incredible and it permeates throughout my entire home without being overpowering. This candle is a dream
This is the most popular fragrance for a reason. Relaxing and calming scent. My only wish is that it cost less! Otherwise I’d fill my entire apartment with them.

This is one of my favorite Diptyque candles, and I’ve tried them all. It’s long-lasting and the scent’s not overwhelming, just subtly gorgeous. My friends always comment on how good it smells. The only downside is the price, but it’s worth it to splurge once in awhile.
This is one of my favorite Diptyque candles for sure.The scent is pleasant while not too overwhelming.If you are willing to spend a little more for a candle I would definitely recommend this product.

This is more on the sweeter side among all Diptyque candles that I own. Good scents but my husband doesn’t like it because of the sweetness. Burns really well just like any other Diqtique candles and I’d recommend this to somebody who likes a sweet scent that is not overly fruity but has an elegant mixture of fruitiness and florals.
It smells sooooooo oooooooooohhhhh good and it pains me that it's so expensive because I'd have this on every night otherwise.

There isn’t anyone on this planet who wouldn’t love this candle. That’s why they make such great gifts (for others, or yourself). I’m not even really a candle person. They are expensive but also miles better than anything else.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I would have to say the Diptyque Baies Mini Candle is only OK.  This was a blind purchase. I wasn't sure what I would receive but had I smelled this prior to purchasing, I don't think I would have settled on this scent.  I was hoping for more of a berry smell, but to me this smells more like my Grandmothers house in the sense that it smells like dusty roses.  Perhaps I've purchased this candle in the wrong season; spring may be a better time to light this. 

However, with all that being said, as a candle I have to say it is spectacular.  I live in a studio type apartment and this mini candle certainly gets around the place.  The scent is soft and not overwhelming so I don't mind that my home smells faintly of roses. Also, when I put the flame out; the scent doesn't transform into some gruesome odor as many other popular brands do, which is a huge plus for me and future Diptyque purchases.  

I do recommend smelling before buying but if you're like me and make blind purchases then honestly this isn't a bad one to make.

Perfect gift! My friend loved it. 

It arrived very quickly.

Will be my go to "no gifts please" gift.

I got this candle several months ago at the suggestion of a friend who was burning in her home. Due to the high price I burn it sparingly so I enjoy it for a while but it is quite costly. The fragrance is fabulous and relaxing and makes the room(s) smell absolutely fresh and wonderful. Many compliments!  Getting ready to order 3 more. 2 for me and 1 for a gift.

I adore this candle. It is pricy, but the scent lingers and it only takes a short time for it to do so. I have repurchased a couple of times and it is by far my favorite. For folks with very sensitive noses, this candle might be too strong. I think it's funny that the earlier reviewer hated this because it is too strong, but loved the fig candle. I, personally, could not smell the fig candle at all, so I guess she's correct that this is a much stronger candle. I love it! It's just so unique and makes a perfect gift.
Lovely candle! The scent fills the whole room. Smells mostly like roses, but very nice!
Love the smell and the long burn time on these candles.  I have a few of them and this is by far my favorite scent.
I started with 1 Baies scented candle and now I have one in each room!  These smell so good and last a while.  I will definitely replace them when I finish them!
This is one of my favorite candles from Diptyque. The smell is just beautiful!

I was excited to receive this candle due to how popular this specific scent is. I had not originally smelled it in store, and just decided to purchase on a whim. Not the greatest idea. I really did not like the smell, and ultimately exchanged it in store for Diptyque's fig scent. The Baies candle has a strong smell, so I would encourage shoppers to smell it in store before purchasing.

I ordered two Diptyque candles on a whim, basically because I kept seeing them on Interior Design blogs. Anyhow, I ordered Baies and Figuier, basically because they just seemed to be the most popular fragrances. I liked the Figuier, but Bies just smelled tart and was just a very difficult fragrance to be around for me. Of course fragrance is totally subjective, which I understand, but this one wasn't my fave. However, I would recommend Figuier and I plan to try some of the other scents.

Diptyque candles are my go to gifts for housewarmings and birthdays - they are just so luxurious and you can't go wrong. The Baies, though I believe is supposed to be berries, is a clean, floral, rose smell that is incredible and is a perfect scent in the summer or winter. Because the large candles are so strong, I like these smaller sized ones for mixing scents and for lighting in smaller rooms.

Baise by Diptyque is the best everyday smell. I've never received so many compliments on the smell of my apartment then when I have this burning. The life of this candle lasts much longer than other types, and the jars are great for a variety of things once the candle is gone! They make great gifts, too!

I'm never disappointed when I order. Love all the products
Love this oil! I put it on immediately after showering. I have very dry skin so sometimes I even put the Anti Aging balm over top of it. Both products are great and smell good too!
I love how smoothly it goes on and absorbs. I've tried many products and the Undaria is the best. My skin is maintaining a very healthy look and glow. LOVE IT!!

This oil soaks right into your skin, leaving it feeling luscious and nourished! I love the light smell and how it leaves my skin all glow-y!! I am sometimes hesitant to use oils but this one is perfect and is amazing right after the shower or bath!
This is not greasy, but moisturizing! Love the smell too!
LOVE this stuff. It smells soooo good and leaves my skin silky soft.

I have been using OSEA's Undatia Algae Oil for 2 years now and am completely addicted. I mix my Ocean Lotion and Algae Oil together to use as my moisturizer every morning. Not only does it hydrate my skin and make it glow, but it smells amazing! I get so many compliments about the scent. My skin loves this product, and yours will too! :)
I use this oil in extra dry areas all over my body. Incredible!

I put this oil on my legs after shaving and basically all over my body and it smells terrific and it keeps my skin so hydrated and moisturized, it's ridiculous. A little always goes a long way with Osea, and although I apply this to big areas of my body, I still have over half the bottle left after two and a half months time!
I love this body oil. It smells wonderful and is so hydrating for my dry skin. I prefer to use oils over lotions and this is my go to oil year round.
This oil is amazing, especially in combination with the body balm. It soaks right in and leaves your skin feeling soft and supple! I LOVE this oil!
This oil is fantastic!!! A little goes a long way too so it lasts forever. I use it everywhere too, not just on my face.

I love everything about this product: The smell, the colour, how it makes my skin feel...it's just like your skin just got a spa treatment! I applied it when my skin is slightly wet from the shower and massage it into my skin- amazing!

I absolutely love this product! I put on pump of oil and mix with the Ocean Lotion. It doesn't leave my skin oily or greasy and leaves my skin moisturized! I also noticed when I mixed the oil with the lotion and used it as body lotion my scars slowly disappeared after a few weeks of use.

This is not at all what I was looking for. It was an oil that made my hair very oily. I had used an OSEA product at a spa that was not oily and dried in my hair. When washed out my hair was very silky and soft. This is the product that your company recommended when I called and they were totally wrong. And then, the bottle broke in my shower because it was so slippery from the oil. Not a safe way for to distribute an oily product such as this! I would never recommend this expensive product to anyone!!

I first bought this because the smell was heaven. But when I started using it, I couldn't believe what it did for my skin. First, being over 50, it is difficult to keep my skin hydrated. This oil not only hydrates it but makes it smooth like a baby - both on my body and my face. My wrinkles honestly look like they are fading! Then I fell and cut up my knee and thought for sure I would get a scar. I started putting the oil on the cut and I swear, it healed faster and it looks like there will be no trace of the injury. And lastly - you won't believe this one - I have had this toenail fungus for about 5 years, literally. Nothing has made it go away - until now. I have been putting the oil on the nail and under the nail bed and the fungus is slowly going away. I'm a lifer for this product. If I could dip myself in a tub of it, I would!!
I LOVE LOVE LOVE this oil. I started using it on my face instead of body and can't stop. I've been using it with the Advanced Protection Cream. I especially like smell... Thanks OSEA!
I read that Undaria Algae blocks the enzyme that breaks down hyaluronic acid in the skin - AWESOME! My skin hasn't looked this good since I was born!

I have a major love affair with this oil. I literally want to put it on all day long. It smells like heaven and makes my skin so soft and glow-y. The fact that it has pristine wild sourced
 Algae is what make me the most excited. I know how important healing sea minerals are for your health and it just feels good knowing that I can apply them to my skin as well. Beauty on the inside and the outside, what more could you ask for in a product?
If I never moisturize with anything else again, Undaria Algae Oil would be my one and only choice. The formula isn't greasy and super hydrating. My dry skin is transformed and never irritated.

Highly recommend this line and will now listen to Shakiba!

I had previously been using Glytone by Dermalogica but was interested in finding something that would do a better job at clearing my acne prone skin. The store associate put a sample of the Power Glow Peel in with my purchase of the m-61 cleanser and she said I would see visible results overnight. I used the product that evening and was shocked that in the morning my face already showed improvement. Went back to the store and purchased a box of 30. I have been using this product for 2 months now with such incredible improvement to my skin I was able to stop using all my prescription acne lotions and EVEN my oral medication. This product has changed my skin, diminished breakouts and dramatically healed the acne that was present when I started using the product. I feel so much happier when I look at my skin up close in the mirror now thanks to this line. I Love it!!

I use this in conjunction with the Power Cleanse from M-61. Wonderful product line that I was introduced to when I was specifically looking for sulfate-free products for my combination/acne prone skin. I only use this about twice a week, and I literally cut out all of my other acne treatments and products because it works SO well. It reduced a cystic bump on my chin by 80% overnight! It left a prickly sensation on my skin after the first couple of treatments, though that was reduced with consistent use. I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I think it is too expensive for a consistent purchase and my box had a missing treatment (though that was my fault for not checking pre-purchase). I wish they would make this in a bottle so I could use it more frequently as a toner!

I use this in conjunction with M-61 power cleanse. Overall, I love the product! It made a painful, cystic acne bump on my chin go down by 80% after one use! I have VERY sensitive skin and it's not too drying to use every other day. It is quite tingly, and feels almost like prickly needles for 2 minutes after applying. My main complaint is the price, and I feel as if I'm wasting treatment by the towelette packaging. Would love if you made this in a bottle, would be more resourceful and worth every penny!

After being on countless over-the-counter and prescription regimens to help clear my acne, nothing seemed to be doing the trick. I have mild acne but also suffer from hyper pigmentation, so any acne I do get leaves a mark when it goes away! In desperation, I went to the ladies at Blue Mercury and they recommended this product. I've been using the peel pads for 3 weeks and not only is my skin glowing, but it has eliminated almost ALL my acne and faded the hyper pigmentation. I use the power cleanser before the peel pads every night, followed by a light moisturizer, and have never been happier with a skincare line! Being on a college budget, I am wary of shelling out so much money for skin care, but with these products from M-61, the money is well spent - I have recommend this peel and the line in general to all my friends! I will definitely be repurchasing.

I tried a sample as I have sensitive skin and was amazed at the results in one day! I applied before bed, and when I woke up, my skin felt so soft and was clearer. I felt as if I just left the spa after a great facial. I will be buying in bulk!

I'm learning to love this product line more and more. It's a great product line with effective and quality ingredients. I used to use this product when it was a 2-step process; this updated version is awesome... single step and added ingredients - that are good for your skin...I use a tretinoin cream on my face but rotate time off and have been using these instead with visible results. I'm not against spending money on quality skin care and cosmetics but these single packs are quite pricey, especially when using them every day. Perhaps a jar of them in the future to eliminate the individual packaging when not traveling? Aside from that - love them!

I have never before reviewed a product, but I had to give a huge shout out for the m-61 Power Glow Peel because it ELIMINATED my hormonal acne (you know- that nasty, perimenopausal, monthly - like clockwork, congested chin kind). As I have sensitive skin, I followed the directions, easing in with use 2-3 times per week for a few weeks each night. Now I use every evening with sunscreen every day. Three months - no acne. None, nada. My skin is smoother, lines diminished. Seriously good stuff.

The M-61 Power Glow Peel is the best thing I have ever used on my face! I used two applications several days a part. In the beginning I was very skeptical because I did peel like crazy and had minor itching from the skin flaking off. However after about 9 days my skin looked amazing! My 'marionette' lines around my mouth are almost gone. My face is so smooth! I haven't looked this good in 10 years. I am 54 years old and this product for me, has had the most dramatic results I have ever seen with any product I have ever used. If you can stand the process of the peeling then you will be amazed at the end results.

I have congested skin that suffers from whiteheads and blackheads, and that also has a rough texture and large pores. This product, in conjunction with a few others that I found at Blue Mercury, has made my skin at 31 better than it has ever been. Despite dealing with mild rosacea, I am able to use this peel every night, after I wash my face with a gentle cleanser. Not only has the congestion cleared up, but my skin is truly smooth to the touch, and it only took maybe two days or so for my skin to adjust to the product (I have basically no redness or irritation after using). 
                 
                 
                 
                 To be fair, I use this product in conjunction with several others from Blue Mercury, most notably the Cane + Austin Acne Treatment Pads in the morning, and the Tammy Fender Clarifying Dermagel immediately after the Power Glow Peel. I think it is the combination of these products that really makes a difference and I will be sure to review them as well.

I am 54 years old and this product for me, has had the most dramatic results I have ever seen with any product I have ever used. If you can stand the process of the peeling then you will be amazed at the end results.

I have congested skin that suffers from whiteheads and blackheads, and that also has a rough texture and large pores. I think it is the combination of these products that really makes a difference and I will be sure to review them as well.
